name: Juiblex
immunities: poison; bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical attacks
conimmunities: blinded, charmed, deafened, exhaustion, frightened, grappled, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned, prone, restrained, stunned, unconscious

traits.name: Foul
traits.desc: Any creature, other than an ooze, that starts its turn within 10 feet of Juiblex must succeed on a DC 21 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned until the start of the creature's next turn.

traits.name: Innate Spellcasting
traits.desc: Juiblex's spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 18, +10 to hit with spell attacks). Juiblex can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components: * At will: acid splash (17th level), detect magic * 3/day each: blight, contagion, gaseous form

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
traits.desc: If Juiblex fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: Juiblex has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Regeneration
traits.desc: Juiblex regains 20 hit points at the start of its turn. If it takes fire or radiant damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of its next turn. Juiblex dies only if it starts its turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

traits.name: Spider Climb
traits.desc: Juiblex can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.
